stripped_text: Whenever you score an agenda, you may swap it with an agenda in the Runner's score area worth at least 1 point, then resolve the "when scored" ability on that agenda.
text: Whenever you score an agenda, you may swap it with an agenda in the Runner's score area worth at least 1 point, then resolve the "when scored" ability on that agenda.
title: Investigator Inez Delgado A

faces.stripped_text: Whenever the Runner steals an agenda, you may resolve the "when scored" ability on that agenda, then swap it with an agenda in your scored area.
faces.text: Whenever the Runner steals an agenda, you may resolve the "when scored" ability on that agenda, then swap it with an agenda in your scored area.
